your_active_v3_liquidity_positions_will_: Your active V3 liquidity positions will appear here.
check_out_our_v3_lp_walkthrough_and_migr: Check out our V3 LP walkthrough and migration guides.
easily_monitor_and_harvest_your_active_p: Easily monitor and harvest your active positions.
this_will_clear_all_current_information_: This will clear all current information in the table.
custom_built_in_launchpad: Custom-built infrastructure for Venom native public sales
name: Name
how_price_is_determined_content_1: You can contribute with ETH in exchange for LEX and esLEX tokens, which are to be claimed 24h after the end of the sale.
how_price_is_determined_content_2: The tokens you will receive will have the exact same ETH value than your contribution.
how_price_is_determined_content_3: 25,000,000 LEX and 25,000,000 esLEX (out of a 1,000,000,000 total supply) will be allocated to the sale.
how_price_is_determined_content_4: The final price will therefore be:
claiming_process_content_1: Te public sale will last i=until Apr 17th - 11am UTC.
claiming_process_content_2: Starting Apr 18th - 3pm UTC, the purchased tokens will be entirely and directly claimable from this same page, at the exact same time as trading starts.
claiming_process_content_3: In order to align the long-term objectives of the protocol, 1/2 of the sale will be distributed in esLEX, with the other 1/2 in LEX.
three_stages_sale_content_1: This sale will take place in two different stages.
three_stages_sale_content_2: During the first 12h, only whitelisted addresses can participate with a guaranteed capped allocation.
three_stages_sale_content_3: During the following 12h, only whitelisted addresses can participate, with a 5x higher allocation cap.
three_stages_sale_content_4: Starting Apr 15 - 11am UTC, other participants can purchase the remaining tokens on a first-come, first-served basis. This stage will last for 48 hours.
